panels.title: Number of encounters by sizeDelta : increase[30m]
Number of rounds by sizeDelta : increase[30m]

targets.expr: sum by (sizeDelta)(increase(encounter_rounds_sum{job="spring_monsters_faceoff"}[30m]) or increase(encounter_rounds_sum{job="quarkus_micrometer_faceoff"}[30m])) / sum by (sizeDelta)(increase(encounter_rounds_count{job="spring_monsters_faceoff"}[30m]) or increase(encounter_rounds_count{job="quarkus_micrometer_faceoff"}[30m]))
